qas.question: What is the difference in appearance between an RLV disc and a regular LD?

answers.text: reflective purple-violet (or blue with some RLV discs) color

qas.question: Why do RLV discs have a blue or purple reflective color?

answers.text: to make it recordable, as opposed to the silver mirror appearance of regular LDs

qas.question: For what purpose were RLVs popular?

answers.text: making short-run quantities of LaserDiscs for specialized applications such as interactive kiosks and flight simulators
